Show options based on the references or: Show options based on the references or the enumeration values and captions.
Empty option caption will be shown by de: Empty option caption will be shown by default or if configured default value matches none of the options
Caption: Caption
Attribute used to store the last value o: Attribute used to store the last value of the filter. Associations are not supported.
Action to be triggered when the value or: Action to be triggered when the value or filter changes.
Assistive technology will read this upon: Assistive technology will read this upon reaching the input element.
